text:
@realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN (CNN) - A divide has emerged inside President Donald Trump's inner circle over whether he should turn his attention back to the coronavirus pandemic or continue to focus on reopening the economy, sources familiar with the matter tell CNN.
And yet here you are tweeting about this?
